dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Shows northern Calabria; Magna Graecia is the collective name for the ancient Greek seaport colonies in southern Italy. cf. Webster's new geographical dictionary. Latin text on verso with caption title: Calabria, sive Magna Græcia; p. 105; signature Ssss. From: Theatrum orbis terrarum, sive, Atlas novus ... / editae a Guiljel. et Ioanne Blaeu. Amsterdami : apud Iohannem Guiljelmi F. Blaeu, 1644-1645. Vol. 3.
dct_publisher_sm: [Amsterdam : Willem Janszoon Blaeu and Joan Blaeu, 1645]
